DOC.brief_title: Chocolate Consumption Healthy Pregnant Women Trial
DOC.criteria: nonsmoking normotensive woman age 18 35 year , 7 12 week gestation ( document ultrasound ) live fetus confirm fetal heart auscultation Patients family history premature cardiovascular disease Chronic hypertension Currently previously use medication interfere glucose lipid metabolism . Use supplement natural health product interfere blood pressure . Consumption 1 alcohol drink per day . Allergy intolerance nut chocolate .
